addNewApp.title: Add New Application
addNewApp.thankyoutitle: You just got this app for everyone in your organization
addNewApp.toaddthisapp: To add this app to your site, you will need to have the latest version of AgilePoint App Builder. Get the newest version of AgilePoint App Builder.
addNewApp.clicksettings: Upload the downloaded package, the application will be added to your App Builder.
addNewApp.find: Go to Build Apps home page and click on Import icon as shown in the image below.
addNewApp.clickthetext: Login to the app with your credentials
addNewApp.gotothe: Go to the AgilePoint App Builder site where you want to install this app.
addNewApp.updateconfirm: Please select whether you want to upload a new version or edit the existing version.
addNewApp.approveconfirm: Do you want to approve this package?
addNewApp.rejectconfirm: Do you want to reject this package?
addNewApp.imagedeleteconfirm: Do you want to delete this image?
addNewApp.unpublishconfirm: Do you want to unpublish your package?

welcomePage.createNewAppContent: Let you create new application,elcome to the AgilePoint NX Technical complete technical documentation for the AgilePoint NX, including installation, administration, and developer guides.
welcomePage.myAppsContent: List of all application, AgilePoint Mobile BPM provides secure native application delivery of AgilePoint processes and forms on Android platforms thus extending the full power of process automation to mobile touch points everywhere.
welcomePage.archivedAppsContent: List all Archieved application, The online help for AgilePoint NX is on a separate site. This table gives links to the online help for AgilePoint NX apps. These links open in a new window or tab. Document Description Work Center
welcomePage.announcementsContent: Access to all your application,A message that sends when an event occurs in a process. Notifications can send through applications such as e-mail, Skype for Business , Yammer , or Salesforce Chatter . Notifications Notifications
